availability.p: Distributed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 license.

bibl.title: Nāgavarmma’s Kāvyāvalōkanam: A standard Kannaḍa work on Poetics, of the 12th century: and the same author’s Karṇāṭaka Bhāshā-bhūshaṇam (Rveised Edition): A Kannaḍa Grammar in Sanskrit Sûtras, expanding Śabdasmṛiti, the first chapter of Kâvyâvalôkanam.

listWit.witness: ka = A copy of a palm-leaf manuscript numbered 572 at the Kannaḍa Sāhitya Saṁsthe in Mysore, containing folios 74–117. A few folios are damaged.
i = Variant readings of Narasiṁhācārya’s edition. Since Narasiṁhācārya did not give the source of these variants, they are not given here.
ga = Microfilm of ms. N. 606 from Mūḍabidare Jaina Maṭha. Incomplete; only reads up to sūtra 114.
ca = A manuscript in the possession of D. L. Narsiṁhācār.
ma = The main variants supplied by the Madras copy.

lg.l: nāvagamoldīge kāvyadoḷnaviṣkr̥ta sakalatatvanīgemagaṟavaṁpadmaprabhana viṁśati prarūpaṇī ṭīkeya ādiyalli ī padyavide.
ḍukoneduḍu koṇḍu konedeydeḍu konedeydeḍu konerdeyde nalavinde kīkīrtisuttire mudadiṁ

div.head: prathamādhikaraṇaṁ: śabda smr̥ti

lg.l: taradindaṁ sandhi nāmasthiti vitata samāsakramaṁ taddhitaṁ vi

div.head: 1. sañjñā prakaraṇaṁ

lg.l: nirataṁ hrasvaṁrantaraṁ hrasvadiṁ dvimātra maṁmumaṁtadu dīrghaṁ
ku kkū kū3 endu kōḻa kūgiduvādāgaḷ
ṇa na maṁ gaḷe ya va la mananunāsikamuṁ ma
kutapa kkēṁ sēvekkaṁ sēvekkeyyade sāmarava mukhara mukhā
la ra ḍagrahaṇadedo ḷa ṟa ṟā
mmemba chaṭacchaṭemba dhaga yemba dhagaddhagayeṁlemba dhagal dhagaleṁba thaṭṭupo
sovaḍondoyyane bandu poyye muniḷisindāraydu kempuṇmi po
kiviyaṁ niccaḷamappinaṁ teṟedu nindōrondaṟoḷ tāgi pō
pogaḻva bāygaḷenippu vaṇminadaṇminedaṇmina pempu bīrara bīranā
ivaḷaṁ śr̥ṅgārasāraṁ kusumaśarane mēṇ māḍidaṁ prōllasatpa
llava puṣpaṁ mēṇ basantaṁ bayasi paḍedanettaṁ sudhāsāramaṁ sū
suva candraṁ tāne mēṇ puṭṭisidanatijaḍaṁ chāndasaṁ padmajaṁ ni
ḍāgade barpudendu nuḍiyal bagevatappoḍe pōpudarke ta
nugaḷoḷḷiṁ bhōrene bandu pāyvudadepāyutirppudidu, poyyu tirppudidu nōḍākāśagaṅgājalaṁ
nuḍidane ēno ē adu keyya dumēṇ

idakke badalāgi ca pratiyalliruva padya:
onderaḍu mūṟu nālkai
dendeṇisuttāgaḷante naḍetandippa
ttondādoḍāgaḷāhō
endaṁ gaḍa paraśurāmanatikupita manaṁōhō iraliṁ peṟavaṟa
dare eḍe kārmukavyasana karmaṭhadhanvi jana pravēkariṁ
dare eḍeyoyeḍe peeḍe epare ermeyondupariyiṁ purabāhiramoppi tōṟuguṁ
rpane kaḷe kūranēḷidikegaṇḍudike ḍaṅgudakegaṇḍu bisuḻpane uḥē bisuḻpaniṁneṁ

tātane indranātane manōbhavaguṇōnnatanātane ambujōdbhavaṁparaṁanantara ga dalli baruva heccina padya:
.........aniyōgakke
māmaranalladillatanigampina malligeyalladillapoṁ
dāmareyalladillakoḷarvakkigaḷiñcara malladillagī
tāmr̥tamalladillakaḍumuddina celvina peṇḍiralladi
llāmahi bhōgabhūmiyo manōbhavarājana janmabhūmiyō
ṇbuḻila taḷadoḷ rudraṁ kaṇḍalli kaṇbolanāgige ke
nelva peṇakke perdeṟage vairiya nālku balakkamoṁdoṁde baṁ

label.add: la mundina pa - e gaḷige va
svara, ya, la gaḷa mundina ma kke va
ra mundina pa ba kke va

lg.l: nile munde sa kāra madalli bahuḷaṁ catvaṁ
madamaṁ mukkuḷisirda dantighaṭegaḷ patteṇṭu lakkaṁ raṇō
nmada pattivrajamemba sainyamadadiṁ baṁdar palarduppaḷaṁ kādiyō
svaradoḷ na ṇa la ya ḷa kāramanituṁ hrasvā
dinnuṁ ponnanemunnaṁ ponnaṁ munnaṁ honnaṁ paḍevudu
khyāta vibhaktigaḷadarkedakkevakke kārakavaśadiṁī padyada baḷika ga dalli ... am, ke, im, ad, av, oḷ.... endū, ca dalli m, am, iṁ, ke, at, ā, oḷ ivēḷuṁ vibhaktigaḷu endū ide.
tolagisu neladeneṟeya neladoḷoda vigi su jasamaṁ
ī padya ā dalli mātra ide.ālargaṇ mīmboṇarantire
rkuḍigaḷ puṇyada bīḍu biṭṭa guḍigaḷ dharmārthigaḷappa kai
ruṁraṁ gaṅgeya nīrumembivī nikhiḷavaṁ nikhiḷavivu sakalabinaṁ nikhiḷa jaga

app.rdg: ir ar dir vir kaḷ lakṣyaṁ

lg.l: dbhāvisi negaḻguṁ ma naṁ svaraṁ nile paradoḷ
ī padya ca dalli 23neya sūtrada keḷage bandide.haranagamintidu laṅkē
caturantakṣitikānte kēḷ jaladhi kēḷ saptārci kēḷ tāta mā
ruta kēḷ mārutamārga kēḷ pagevanaṁ kondenna kōpāgnigā
giḷiyē tumbiya bambalē puḷinamē beṭṭiṅgaḷē candranē
tara suratālayaṅgaḷira cāru vilōla kaṭākṣapāta suṁ
dara parivāra dēviyarirā kaḍukeydu kr̥tāntanintu ni
sāralāṭisuvoḍiṁ taḍavaltēvudiṁ taḍamaltēvadiṁ taḍavaltēvodiṁ taḍamenevūḍiṁ taḍamaltēṁ
navaṁ piḍidu padmajaṁ taguḷe pāḍi sānāmaṅgaḷaṁ
pambaliparakaribambalesalke takka vacaṟāgimā sadōgaragampu māva pū
sugi nammāduḷudanāgaluṁ nasa meyaluṁ meydarkumē tāraneṁ
amr̥tada kaṇḍa sakkareya kūṭamumolvamōpaḷa kūṭamuṁ samā
name valamolladaḷge viṭanēnāṭa viṭaṁ bare kūṭamiṁbagegūṭadiṁbare kūṭadiṁbage gūṭamiṁpanī
gume belegoṇḍanā belege meyvele mey ninatigitettenemba kū
nosaloḷ kaṇ gaḍamendu nambinacci poredeṁ tānakke tammammana
bisuṭar jōḷada pāḻiyaṁ bagedarillā drauṇiyuṁ drōṇanuṁdrōṇanuṁ drauṇiyaṁ
ḍā na ranaydāṟu devasamaṁ baḻdavanaidāṟa divasadoḷ bandapanē
ninage kūranaḻal ninataltune dal nanagitta kē
adu sukhadondu piṇḍamadu puṇyada puñjamadaṅgajaṅge bā
gōva ra guggurigeru guggurike māḍiyuṁ taṇiyay pe
spadeyaṁ sādhisi kabbigaṅge nelanaṁvalaṁ nirvājyajadindaṁ nimi
cadura pāḻiya sīḷada pempindā satigār dore dhātriyoḷ
jētr̥ve paśuvāge yāme bēḷavegi nāve beḷevevuge nāme bēḷeve munnaṁ
kkuṁ nānānnavipāki vallalanaṁ nānābhōjya vipākivallalanaṁ nānābhujyavipāka pallalanavaṁ bhīmaṁ hayādhyakṣatā
meyverci vidhātranirade muyvaṁ nōṁḻpaṁnarame muyvāntirpaṁnerame muyvaṁ nōḷkuṁ
gī nidrābhaṅgamaṁ māḻpudu padanaṇamaltendu nindāntu vāgaḷ
graṇigaḷ kaikoṇḍu pogaḻe sale negaḻdivu dhā
divakkaḍaralēṇiyaṁ sameyaluṁ valaṁ bāḻtedelara bārte yeṁ
ṇgeḍaṟeṇgedaṟe, ṇgiḍademanaṁ berce sutana barpanduṁ ce
baliya māntada bēṭabeṭṭadoḷ polageṭṭu biccane biṭṭaka
llara bagegaltu vastukr̥tiyaṁ sale pēḻvudu kaltupēḻadaṁ
sulipal sōrmuḍi teḷvasiṟ peṟenosal pombāḷe paccōle nē
rmole celvāgire ninda bēḍatiyaraṁ kaṇḍaṁ mahīvallabhaṁ
taradoḷ ṇa ṭa ḷa na taṅgaḷ
kaṭṭaḷe cauvaṭada mērutanada mēgutanada mēru nanniya tavarūr

label.add: kiṟidemba ṟa kārakke vyañjanāntada ta kāra

lg.l: ḷtondida keṅguḍiya pudivu muttina kakoḍe ce

label.add: paccane, keccane kramavāgi pasur, kisu ādudakke

lg.l: gaḻaveya kūḻ tivuḍugaḷeda tovariya tove kā
mukkoḍe puṣpavr̥ṣṭi suradundubhi kēsaripīṭhavondidaṁmonde taṁmunde taṁ
tidikkuva cāmaraṁ miṟupa pūgaḷa goñcalaśōke bhānuvaṁkṣaṇaṁ
tīvirdattumodal modalge paṇeyuṁ mūgayya mūgayya ni
tīvirdattu taḷir modal paṇe kavalkombembuvī kendaḷir

div.label: prayōgaṁ:
[nālku, aydu, āṟu, ēḻu, eṇṭu embivu kramavāgi
nāl, ay, aṟu, ēḻ, eṇ ādudakke]

lg.l: dāraidārtaḍe māḍidaṁraidārtaḍedandu taṁgaidattuḍe māḍidaṁdu maguḻdattīrāṟu varṣambaraṁ
orvaṁ bandonde tēroḷ nereda kurubalavyūhamaṁ kīṟi beṅkomāṟāṁ
maadamūrūra madābudā ḷigañcegaḷa celvūrūkalpāraṅgūra ṣaṇḍakke pā
goḷe naḍe nōḍi nōḍi kuṇiyalneṟe kaltukalāguṇaṁ poda
māḻpinegaṁ jalakkanire pēḻadeḻuvudu kemmanogaṇṭunoṟaṇṭunegaṇṭu vēḻdu ciḥ
kasavaradāseyiṁ padayoḷ padayiṁ paḍepudōrpaḻiveṇḍira nalmeyendu bhā
visadiru nīṁ manōnayanavallabha kūrisi kūrta ninna mey
pasuvaṁ mōduvavōle mōdeyumadaṁ kaṇḍante palgarci sai
naḍe kōlvaramandaṁnaḍe naḍukolvaramaṁ maṁḍe naḍekolvaramaṁ bura
jaḍiyeyuṁ bayeyuṁjaḍiyaluṁ bayaluṁjaḍiyaluṁ bareyaluṁbaḍeyeyuṁ bayeyuṁ balagarvadiṁ
māyaṁ saye baḻdu dondu bāḻuṁ bāḻē
piḍidē kīḻvude diggajēndra cayakuḷamaṁ mārpoyvudē kaṭṭini
takkumadavaḷ sitaga patige mige kāyvaḷ nō
nigaḷambol toḍardirda mōhanigaḷaṁ nirvyākuḷaṁ piṅge ma
tanagiṁ bappudanāydu nōḍi palavuṁ bilvilgaḷoḷ billanoṁ
hana rūpiṁ nakhadoḷ vidārisi kusumbhāraktamaṁ paṭṭagā
ṟane pāsantavene, se tōḍuvanta karuḷaṁ nīṁ tōḍiday daityanā
ttāyadāyati tōḷoḷoppire mikka pempina kīrti nā
munisiṁ mēletti barpandina vipuḷa śilāstambhaṁmaṁ kīṟi kīḻvaṁ
janamellaṁ nōḍe cauvaṭṭada bisuvuḍiyoḷa biḻdu sāvantuṭāytē
indu piṅgiduvemma pīḍesēdesēnegaḷindu sārduvu saipu tā
marada neḻalge pōpe gaḍa kāmana ḍāmaramalli kōkilō
kiḍisal sālvirvir samāsādi taraṇarasikar nimma mundādamaṇmaṁ
rpaḍegennī bāḷakēḷīviḷasanasita manadaṁ yuddhadoḷ nāḷe tōrpeṁ
nnondu sandeyamilla tēranesapeṁ nīṁ kādi gel phalgunā
sarala baramaṁnaranabalamaṁ kaṇḍiṁ keṭṭittu bhāratamendu tā
kādaśamakke kīrti paredirke jayāṅgane kūrkerge niccaluṁ
pāyadaḍaṅgi nil bhramariyoḷ bhramiyantire beccarāgu kha
ḻgāyudha cāmaraṁcāpamaṁbhōgamaṁ poḷeva miñcane pōltire bīsu nīṁ khaḷa
bigi pugu biṭṭu kūḍu jaḍi baggisu poynelenōḍusāyepāyi, sāyivapāyipāyi sā
rdugi koḷenoṅku sārcu kaḍedōṟoḍaḍidūṟōḍeḍidūḻoḷa sandisu sārdudaṇḍeḍaṅge goḷ
pugadeḍemāḍu capparisu rūpiḍu kūkāpiḍu kūnōrpudōṟu pā
ṟagiyade kūrmemikku tenege toṅgalanimbene nūṅku yuddhamaṁbirdanaṁbirduvaṁ
gatiyāgallōpaṁge lōpamaṁ, galu lōpaṁgala lōpaṁ mēṇ
bageyal gaḍa ninage sumati bēṟāṁ bēṟē
bhisuguṁ pārśvāgataṁ nōḻparaneṟagisuguṁ sārci tadvidyaraṁ raṁ
trisi citrakkāyuvoydaṁ madananene karaṁ kānte kaṇgoppi tōrkuṁ

div.trailer:
idu sakaḷasukavijanamanassarōjinīrājahaṁsāyamānānūna
kavitāguṇōdayaṁ śrīidu nāgavarmapraṇītamappa kāvyāvalōkanadoḷ
śabdasmr̥tiyembuduyoḷ prathamādhikaraṇaṁkāraṁ

div.head: 2 kāvyamalavyāvr̥ttyadhikaraṇaṁ
padapadārtha sandhidōṣa viniścaya prakaraṇaṁ

lg.l: pasaraṅguḍadesapa maḷīsaraṅguḍadesaguva mamasuraṁ biḍadesapa maḷīsuraṁ guḍadesaguva maḷī
naṅgāhiyanaṟidu pēḻdu poḍeyaṁ kaḍupordu poḍeyuṁ kaṟupi
ḍaṁ gaḍamele tai ga huyilaga hulilaguhuḥ yadēṁ cōjigamō
cittadoḷāge ninna baḻiyaṁ baralī muḷisēṁ ṭasinta māḷadiṁ
suttuvargalladolle biḍu nīnenagillaḷa pūṟi tōṟiṟu pē
ḻuttiralāseyaṁ bisuṭu nīṁ kaḷeḷi pāṇṭi matakke sairiseṁ

div.trailer:
idu kāvyamalavyāvr̥ttiyoḷ pada-padārtha-sandhidōṣa
viniścayaṁ prathamaṁ prakaraṇaṁ

div.head: vākyavākyārtha dōṣānukīrtana prakaraṇaṁ

lg.l: ḷigadhīśar neredoḍḍi moḍḍi muragar bandeydimeydiṁ mana
rtr̥tvadoḷondiyuṁ nebeṟeye saṁharisal neṟeduṁ sumantu ni
ki kadambaṁ jagatījanakke paḍedatta bhrābhōgamaṁ rāgamaṁ
virahi mr̥gaṁ dalañjisuvavaṁ madhu dallāḍisuvavaṁ madanaṁ balegaḷ latāḷi dalgaḷ
kariku kanaldu kāydayge virahāgnidaloppuva keykoḷaṁ dalā
guri pavanaṁnurivanalaṁ dalembinamanaṅgana bēṇṭeya bindadante baṁbījadandadiṁ
māvina pū māvineḷeya miḍi māvina kāy
dhakratu dhūmadhūtamātu.... tu vādudu gaḍaṁ baḻiyaṁ śikhi dhūmayōniyeṁ
cakrame mecci baṇṇise jasaṁ baḍedaṁ polakēśivallabhaṁ
tāṁ karamoppi tōṟuvuduvu banda basantadoḷondu māmaraṁda nandanāḷigaḷ
biccatamirdu kaṇṇapasavōḍuvinaṁ sale nīne nōḍa pe

div.trailer:
idu kāvyamalavyāvr̥ttiyoḷ vākyavākyārtha dōṣānukīrtanaṁ
dvitīyaṁ prakaraṇaṁ

lg.l: vārade baṇṇikuṁ vibudhamaṇḍaḷi paṇḍita nāgavarmanaṁAlmost identical to Vardhamānapurāṇaṁ 1.25.

div.trailer:
idu sakaḷasukavijanamanassarōjinīrājahaṁsāyamānānūna
kavitāguṇōdayaṁ śrīmannāgavarma praṇītamappa
kāvyāvalōkanadoḷ kāvyamalavyāvyatti
yembudu dvitīyādhikaraṇaṁ

div.head: 3. guṇavivēkādhikaraṇaṁ

div.trailer:
idu guṇavivēkadoḷ mārgavibhāga darśana
prakaraṇaṁ prathamaṁ

lg.l: padavarṇa vyāvr̥ttiilli vyāvr̥tti emba padavannu avr̥tti embarthadalli upayōgiside. daṇḍiya kāvyādarśa III-1nnu nōḍi. da
bhāmaha II-10 ; rudraṭa III-13 inda 16 padyagaḷu ; daṇḍi III-51parivr̥ttaṁ sandaṣṭaṁ

poḷeye puḻila taṇpaṁ noḷdi taḻkaisi biṇpaṁ
berasire śa ṣa sa ha varṇaṁvarṇaṅgaḷ

kusurimaḍikusurike modalāda praśnōttara prakāraṅgaḷgamilli prayōgamaṁgaṅgaḷaṁ kaṇḍukoḷvudu.

lg.l: daṇḍi III-125 ; rudraṭa II-13.nuḍidudadedenedane padavibhaṅga tedidi
rudraṭa VII-11, 12.jāti sahōktibhāva parivr̥tti yathākrama paryayāvaḷī
sogayisi tōrpa sōge koraloḷ pogarvaṭṭesedirpakarpurppaṁ kai
rudraṭa VII-41.paḍuvaḷ kīḻiloḷemmatoḻtu paḍuvaḷ muttabbeyā kōṇeyoḷ
daṇḍi II-351 ; yathāsaṅkhyavē yathākramaṁ II-273 ; rudraṭa VII-34.ondaṁ koṭṭondu ko
idu ninnanīnarcisusidivikṣucāpamidu ninnī lōkamaṁ keyge mā
ttida jaitramīnadhvajamendu tōrpa teṟadiṁ bhrūlāsyamaṁ nīḷdapāṁ
idakke modalu ca dalli yeraḍaṟoḷaṁ bahuḷanibandhasamucitakke endide.avihitavēgaśīta mēḻgeya javaṁ vraṇamakṣata kāyamettika
ṭṭuva madamuṇmisōrva sone bīḻva gajadhvajamambarakke ni
kkuva jayakētu sandeyade dandugamaṁ kibiḍisittu mundaṇō
nuḍi daṁvaṁtire nuḍidava nuḍiye paryāyaṁ ma

div.label: lakṣyaṁ:
paryāyakke
āvaḷige
āvaḷige udāharaṇeyannu koḍuvāga modalu vidhige endiddu munde āpōhakke, endiddare spaṣṭavāguttittu.āvaḷya pōhakke

lg.l: nr̥pana dayeyuṁ naccuṁyiṁ tannaṇmu mārpadumāntarpudumāntaḷpudumātaṁ bhū
koḍe guḍi tōraṇaṁ dadhighana madhudravamaccagaṟuṅke lājesatti saṁ
āṭaṁ bājane gāḍigaḷ paba sadanaṁ beḷdiṅgaḷoḷvātu koṁ
ḍāṭaṁ katturi kappuraṁ nage tegaḻ pāṭaṁ biyaṁ javvanaṁ
rudraṭa VII-100. x daṇḍiya mata : daṇḍi II-65.guṇamane tatōrpudu dōṣada
roḍagūṭa manakka manakkemenakke khaḷara kūṭame sukhadaṁ
pariviḍigeyye sondigiḷi tandeya tāya samīpadoḷ tanū
dariya ratōpayuktarutiyaṁ vinatānane nāṇcitāḷatatōḷata, kāmātatōḷa tatōḷata
vasudhege sandahīnari puvargamanōḍisi cakri mecci ba
kalipārthaṁ pārthanindaṁ kali ravitanayaṁ pārthaniṁ karṇanindaṁ
rudraṭa VII-57.taḷamuṁ kendaḷiruṁ kucadvitayamuṁ pūgoñcaluṁ tōḷgaḷuṁ
daṇḍi II-261.mogamaṁ tāvare kaṇṇanutpaladaḷaṁ dhammillamaṁ sōge se
ḷḷuguraṁ kēdage purbanaṅgajana bil dantāḷiyaṁ muttu kai
stugaḷoḷ pōliparantadēṁḷoḷ pōlisuvantadēṁḷaṁ pōlisuvantuṭēṁmaruḷarō rūpaṁ vicitrāṅgiyā
gamardudurduṟe, rduṭi, rdenagerduṭi mogaṁ rambhāstambhōru teḷvasiṟoppevi
bhramada kaṇiyaṁ pōltar niltalli bēḍitiyar kelar
ī padyavu ondu pratiyalli mātra ide endu hindina mudrita pratiyallide. īga ‘ca pratiyalli ondu pāṭhāntara mātra sikkide.dānāmbucumbitakapōlatalaṁḷaṁ nava madēbhaṁ
ī padyakke modalu (ca dalli) ondu pratiyalli alliyānudvayakke endide.lateyoḷ naḷitōḷ pallava
ḷgambamanotti kiḻtu lateyemba turaṅgamumaṁ poraḷci dhau
svaṁ saundaryaryaikakke gēhaṁ mahītaḷatiḷakaṁ jāṇa mey nāṇa jīvaṁ
patiyiṁ pimbaḍinoḷ pativratege bēṟonduṇṭe kr̥tyaṁ virā
kṣitigellaṁ tiḷivāge tōrpa teṟadiṁ rāgōdayaṁ piṅge saṁ
aḷigaḷo nīḷda karbogeyo kendaḷirōḷiyo suttugoṇḍu ta
kuḷamo manakke sandayamagundaleyāgire nōḍi nōḍi kaṁ
ṭaḷisuvudenna mey keḷadi pēḻikēḷidu māmaranō davāgniyō
nivahame gettutōrpa maṇidīdhitiyaṁ kuḍamiṁ cecu gettu po
daṇḍi II-340, 169, cf. rudraṭa VIII-79.bagedirdu bēṟadondaṁ
daṇḍi II-341mr̥duharitapravāḷa nava śāḍvalarājiyanāydu mēdu ta
samaṟade koṅki nīḷdasiya purvugaḷeccade nāḍeyuṁ beḍaṁ
dhanuvuṁ karbina bil gaḍaṁgoṇegone, goledoṇegone yamuṁ nīrēja sūtraṁ gaḍaṁ
nanegaḷ bāṇacayaṁ gaḍantananu tāṁ mattaṁ manaṁnondu nivenduni
rudraṭa X 2tatvaṁ vyājastutiyavayavasthaṁ virōdhāvitvaṁ viruddhāvatvaṁ viruddhāvabhāsā
tatvajñar vistarise negaḻguṁ śēṣa bhāgabhēda prabhēdaṁ
rudraṭa X 20, II: II daṇḍi 343bagege peṟatarthamondaṁge peṟatumarthamonduṁ
yātaṅgatakka suraṁ bivyayakke guptaṁ ripu saṁ
kiyata kēḷī bhavanājirōpamamukhaṁ bhūbhāgadoḷ nākigaṁThe same verse appears in Vardhamānapurāṇaṁ 16.41.

div.trailer:
idu sakalasukavijanamassarōjinīrājahaṁsāyamānānūna kavitā
guṇōdayaṁ śrī nāgavarmaviracitamappa kāvyāvalōkanadoḷ
guṇavivēkamembudu tr̥tīyādhikaraṇaṁ

div.head: 4 rīti krama rasa nirūpaṇādhikaraṇaṁ

lg.l: iniyana kendaḷaṁ taḷamanoyyane sōṅke podaḷdanāṇa peṁ
dharadoḷ keygūḍi gōtrādrigaḷe gajaghaṭārūpadiṁ tāgeyuṁ ma
tkari tāṅgal tāne sālguṁ peṟapeṟavu ghaṭābandhame bhaṇḍamemboṁ
du raṇōtsāhaṁ manakkubbarisire samārāṭōpamaṁ tāḷdi nindaṁ
bharata VI 17 ; sāḷva sū. 7 ;rati parihāsaṁ śōkō
bharata VI 18-21mati nirvēdāvahitthaśrama mada jaḍagajatā glāni cintōgratērṣyā
sāḷva III 138padeyise soṅki saṅkegiḍesoṅkesaṅkisade mēḷisi meyviḍe taḷuḍitakkutōḷa ta
bageyoḷ poṇmuvalampu kātaraterikeyaṁ tandīye meymeyge saṁ
mige pīrvante manōjarāgarasanurāgarasaja rājasukhamaṁ meyverci kādalme kai
miguvannaṁ neredar manaṁ taṇivinaṁnaḥ priya tamar nānārata prauḍhiyiṁkrīḍeyiṁ
kuṭilānīḷāḷakaṅgaḷ nimirdire beḷarvāy nāḍeyuṁ bīge rōṣōrāgō
viṭavr̥ttaṁ meyyoḷettaṁ pasarisire viṭaṁ bīse nindirdaḷorvaḷ
sphuṭatōrōmadhye bhinnā vaṭu taṭaviviṭata taṭa haṭadranthinirgranthadindaṁ
baḍe bandāṭisi, nōḍidaḷ padapiniṁ śrī vipracakra mārtaṇḍanaṁ
gaṅge dal bigidappidaḷeṁdābā śaṅkege bhōṅkane mōde mu
madanaṅgāvudu dōṣamuṁ teṭe nuḍiyalkēṁ barkumē pāpamaṁ
lgeṟagireyuṁ priyaṁ suḍu suḍēṁ gaḍa sairipudendu kōpadiṁ
nanu vipemisenenna mey baḍavo nallana mey baḍavō niśākarā
pratanakkentā rterttha, rddharttairtthameyyaṁ vanajavadane grīṣmadoḷ niccamettaṁmuntāntu
sati taṭṭuttiṭmāntirpe kāypindurivakoragi besiloḷā mēghaḷentappudu visphūrjitārṇaḥ
sāḷva II 94śrī tannendina rūpatenmandadarūputannandina rūpu kaustubhadoḷaccottirdavōl tōṟe kaṁpē
rpugiyaṁ puṇmayamāgi māḍi bidi muṁ jaṅghāpramāṇakke nū
nagutuṁ sārdu savaṅgamaṁ kaḷetōṟi samāgamakkeḷayisuttirpāke kaṇgoppida
deḻavi tanuvaṁ hā hā hā vatsayendamardappi koṁ
ḍḍida sainyōddhati mattamorme kiḻe kēḷ nirmūla māytinnumo
rmodalennoḷ samanappavaṁ poṭare kīḻvandoppuguṁ beṅgiyēbeṅgiyeṁ, leṅgiyeṁleṅgiyeṁ
sāḷva II 113makaraṁ bāydeṟedandadiṁ teṟegeda bāy pēpīṟerdakūrdāḍene
kka kadampettida purvu pattida basiṟ pōtanda kaṇ mēghaghō
rpa kanadbhūṣaṇabhīvadbhīṣaṇa bhūṣanadbhīṣaṇa bhūṣaṇaṁ bhayadamāytā rākṣasīrūpakaṁ
sāḷva II 114sōrmuḍi sōrdujōldu pindaleya paccaḷaścimamaṁ nijamārgamaṁ bisu
ṭṭormeye kaḻte cammaṭige muṭṭidavol nasu berce tānada
kegaḍaṁ māṇbaro muppaḻal baḍatanaṁ rōgaṁ viyōgaṅgaḷiḷa
mataguḻduṁ puṭṭuvaremba gāmpide valaṁ dhīvīraṅge lajjākaraṁ
bharaṇaṁ kāmaphalōpamaṁ baḷedapaṁ mannandanaṁ sālvudide, di
bhayadiṁ karcidudondu pul mugida key biṭṭirda kēśaṅgaḷuṁ

ondu pratiyalli mātra iī rīti ide : rīti rasabhāgamaṁ vi | khyātiya nāntamaḷavr̥tti vr̥ttaṅgaḷumaṁ || prātikamāgire pēḻdaṁ | bhūtaḷadoḷageseye nāga varmma kavīndraṁ || (ica).rītiyaṁ rasavibhāgamumaṁ vi
sphuritaṁ bhāvise nāgavarmaracitōdāttaprabandhānvayaṁAlmost identical to Vardhamānapurāṇaṁ 1.30.

div.trailer:
idu sakaḷa sukavijanamanassarōjinī rājahaṁsāyamānānūna kavitā
guṇōdayaṁ śrīnāgavarma viracitamappa kāvyāvalōkanadoḷ
rīti kramarasa nirūpaṇaṁ caturthādhikaraṇaṁ

lg.l: ṣkēvaḷamādagi rūḍhivaśadiṁ sale salvudida dalte śiṣṭasaṁ
kāvyamīmāṁse pu. 79, cf kāvyakalpalatāvr̥tti IV94ātata satkavisamayaṁ
viḷamūrdhaṁ naḍe nōḍe pōltudu nagādhīśaṁ khagādhīśanaṁ
ggalisidalampiniṁ bagedudandu janaṁ ghanacandrikāmbuvaṁdeḷasidar ghanacandrikeyiṁ latāṅgiyar
neravannaṁ ravi nilladanastagiriyaṁ sārdaṁ priyaṁ pōgalā
karamaṁ nindisi sindhuvārakusumaśrīyaṁ paḷaṁ cāḍical vibhā

div.head: idakke badalāgi kaca pratigaḷalli mattamalli sadakīrtana prakaraṇamenteṁ doḍe endide.sadakīrtana prakaraṇaṁ

lg.l: prasaramaniḷisiduvu niśeyoḷallokkalargaḷī padyada nantara ondu pratiyalli mātra ī sūtra doreyuttade : āne bidir pandi mugil | mīnambudhi pāvu śaṅkhamembīyeṇṭuṁ sthānaṅgaḷalli puṭṭugu | mēnaccari tiḷidu nōḍe mauktikaratnaṁ || (ca) idu sadakīrtanakke sambandhisuvudilla.
pratiyoḷa haritva vr̥ttiyaneḷe hariyavr̥tti pēḻge budharrkaḷ
poḷeveḷavāḷegaḷ kurduke bāḷegaḷaṁ timi nuṅge nuṅgidā
gaḷe timiyaṁ timiṅgiḷanaḍaṅguvinaṁ tave nuṅge tattimiṁ
karadoḷe nāndu sēḍugoḷutuṁ suḻidūduva gāḷi barpa dē
gadu posa suggi mūguvaḍadilliya kōgile banda māvu bī
tāṁ gaḍamendu mērunagadoḷ poṇardekkatuḷakke vandu nā
danujaranā murāri gele kāduva kāladoḷānadēke puhu
vene danujāriyemba birudaṁpesaraṁ salalīvene kādi pōgalī
lkaṇi tārkṣyaṁ bhakṣisuttuṁ maḷayagiriyoḷirpaṁ balaṁ kēḷirē nī
udayagirīndra rundra taṭadindoge tandadande śaśāṅkanemba soṁnā
kada mr̥gavairi kūḍe paridarbisi parbida dustamamōstamō
ṇano dhātraṁ rūpaniṣpādanavidhiyoḷivaṁ munnamēṁ nōṁ piyaṁ nōṁ
tano pēḻembantu bandaṁ sukavijanamanō mānasōttaṁsa haṁsa
kkidu dal tānākaraṁ nīr tanage savideyādagniyaṁ tāḷdi perci
rdudu candraṁ puṭṭidaṁ mattidaṟoḷe surarutpatti kēḷilli śakraṁkēḷilli sambamattilli śakraṁ
māruti kaṭṭemēṇ paṟidudō girigaḷ bare vajrigaḷkitō
bhīrate sandudendu hari meccikaraṁ pogaḻdaṁ samudramaṁnaṁ
karavāḷuṁḷ bils gade cakramalliye malaṅgirpaḷ jayaśrī nijō
ttama puruṣōttamaṁ besaserasurasi pāṇḍavaroḷ nelasareyalke pōdapeṁ

div.label: lakṣyaṁ:
mukuḷananimīḷanaṅgaḷge
vikāsahāsaṅgaḷge
div.note: illinda mundakke ka dalli patralōpa. 1930ralli accāda saṁstheya mudrita pratiyinda prati māḍalāgide.
div.label: adalladeyuṁ

lg.l: ḷige sorkaṁ giḷigaḷge bīrasiriyaṁ kāvaṅge bercaṁ viyō
gige percaṁ priyargeyde māḍi vidagaḷatpuṣpāḷi teṅgāḷi tī

div.label: tr̥ṣṇābhilāṣaṁṣābhilāṣādigaḷge

lg.l: vāriya nidanaṟatu kaṟunīraṟatu kaṟa, nidanaṟitu kuṟunīraṟatu kaṟutu taḷameyduvinaṁ

div.label: idu kriye

lg.l: tadinardhaśyāmaḷaṁ māḍidudu divanamumaṁ kūḍe rājēndra sainyaṁ
rvida kaḍegaṇṇajarvugaḷo mōdidōḍi, nōḍida neydila nīḷdamāleyiṁ
dudirda madaṅgaḷoḷ toḍardu tōrpa daḷaṅgaḷo pēḻi māvudeṁ
līḷeyiṁ puge puge tannadi kr̥ṣṇaṅgāṭisidantire lōlaka
llōḷa kōmala hastade poydaḷ mundaleyaṁ kamaḷākṣanā
ḷnaḍu naḷitōḷ podaḷdadhara mottadeyuṁ niṟigoṇḍacuñcu sō
rmuḍi kaḍunuṇpuvettatoḍe tumbida pīnanitamba bimbametta mo
jātanayaṁ bagedu tadguhāberada tandu gr̥ha, baredu tadguhābaredu tandu gr̥habhittigaḷoḷ
pallavadoḷ niṟisi maraḷeḷemaṟasi māṇe dūtaṁ nuḍidaṁ
ī padya ondu pratiyalli mātra ide. ca dallilla.eraḍaṟoḷaṁ candrādi
illinda 243nē sūtradavaregū iruva ondu patra cadalli lupta.bimbādharakāntiprati
daṅgaḷ sale karmakartr̥voḷ kartr̥vorttuvuṁ kartr̥vo, rtravēkārthadoḷaṁ
sandudu melvāda moḷvā, du mēlpōḍenikkumadu kannaḍadoḷ
rantanamārgadoḷonde tiḷiye pēḻdaṁḷe tiḷiye pēḻdaṁ beḍaṅgiṁ
bantire tirdi vivēki nākigaṁī eraḍu pratigaḷalli ī padyadoḍane granthasamāptiyāgide.
rtikumanurāgadiṁ vasumatīvaḷayaṁ kavināgavarmanaṁca pratiyalli ī padyadoḍane granthavu samāptiyāgide.The same verse appears at Vardhamānapurāṇaṁ 16.43.

div.trailer:
idu sakalasukavi janamassarōjinīrājahaṁsāyamānānūna kavitā
guṇōdaya śrīmannāgavarma praṇītanāgavarma viracitamappa kāvyāvalōkana
doḷ kavisamayamembudu pañcamādhikaraṇaṁ
